content.raw: @nkoenig I know that it is possible to build gazebo/sdformat in catkin workspaces by inserting a package.xml. I upvoted this because it would be a lot easier to do with the package.xml in the gazebo/sdformat repos. Should that be a separate issue? For the moment I've had to maintain copies of gazebo code including package.xml's for people i work with, so that they can easily build it along with all of our other code: https://github.com/jonbinney/gazebo_ros_wrapper
